TopicTitle: A Mod To Help Align Orbits?

Articles.Content:
I was wondering if anyone knows of a mod to help align an orbit with the KSC?

I don't have the most spectacular eyesight in the world, and I do have trouble being able to tell when an inclined orbit I have to launch a satellite into is directly over the KSC.

Thanks everyone.
I think MechJeb can do this.  Been a long time since I looked at it's launch modules however.
Thanks!  I've never actually used MechJeb but will have a look at it later today.
